scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=haulhub-shared && npm install --workspace=haulhub-frontend && npm install --workspace=haulhub-backend && npm install --workspace=haulhub-infrastructure
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:infrastructure && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build:test: npm run build:all && npm run test:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json haulhub-backend/node_modules haulhub-backend/package-lock.json haulhub-backend/dist haulhub-frontend/node_modules haulhub-frontend/package-lock.json haulhub-frontend/dist haulhub-frontend/.angular haulhub-shared/node_modules haulhub-shared/package-lock.json haulhub-shared/dist haulhub-infrastructure/node_modules haulhub-infrastructure/package-lock.json haulhub-infrastructure/dist haulhub-infrastructure/cdk.out
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules haulhub-backend/node_modules haulhub-frontend/node_modules haulhub-shared/node_modules haulhub-infrastructure/node_modules
scripts.clean:locks: rm -rf package-lock.json haulhub-backend/package-lock.json haulhub-frontend/package-lock.json haulhub-shared/package-lock.json haulhub-infrastructure/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf haulhub-backend/dist haulhub-frontend/dist haulhub-frontend/.angular haulhub-shared/dist haulhub-infrastructure/dist haulhub-infrastructure/cdk.out
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:all
scripts.fresh:test: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:all && npm run test:all
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean:build && npm run build:all
